headline: Abbott Labs Just Extended Its Dividend Aristocrat Status: What Comes Next?
summary: Abbott Laboratories just paid its quarterly dividend of $0.63 per share on February 13, 2026, marking a 6.8% increase from the prior quarterly rate. For income investors evaluating this healthcare giant’s dividend sustainability, the payment arrives amid a complex backdrop: strong operational execution in medical devices offset by product recalls and nutrition segment weakness. With ... Abbott Labs Just Extended Its Dividend Aristocrat Status: What Comes Next?
